pageProduct.name: Aveeno Dermexa Daily Emollient Body Wash 280mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

AVEENO® Dermexa Wash 280mL

Aveeno Active Naturals Dermexa Emollient Body Wash is fragrance-free and suitable for extra dry & irritated skin. Gently cleanses skin without drying, leaving the skin feeling moisturised and soothed.
- Moisturising body wash formula contains colloidal oatmeal
- Gentle body wash for dry sensitive skin
- Soothing on dry, itchy skin
- Clinically proven suitable for eczema prone skin 
- Fragrance free
- No lanolins or dyes and cortisone free.

The Aveeno brand has harnessed the soothing power of Active Naturals oatmeal to provide intensive and long lasting hydration to help relieve and soothe dry, itchy skin. It also contains ceramides that help enhance skin's ability to retain moisture and helps strengthen the skin's protective function. Proud supporter Eczema Association Australia. 

Aveeno Active Naturals.

Suitable For: Eczema prone skin.

Size: 280mL

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Dermatologist recommended
• Suitable for eczema prone skin

Warnings

For external use only. When using this product do not get into eyes.

Ingredients

Water, Sodium Trideceth Sulfate, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Lauroamphoacetate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Hour, Laureth-2, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Xanthan Gum, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Ceramide NP, Panthenol, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract.

Directions

Use daily. For best results apply Aveeno Dermexa Moisturising Cream after cleansing to relieve and soothe very dry skin.
